name: rbf
label: RBF Kernel
description: Radial Basis Function (RBF) kernel, also known as squared exponential or Gaussian kernel. Produces smooth, infinitely differentiable functions.

parameters.label: Lengthscale
parameters.help: Controls the smoothness of the function. Smaller values = more wiggly, larger = smoother.

parameters.label: Signal Variance
parameters.help: Controls the magnitude/scale of the function values.
